諣字的基本解释

諣
huà
疾言。

諣
guā
懒；懈怠。
狡猾。

諣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huà］
［《廣韻》呼卦切，去卦，曉。］
急疾地说。
[②]［guā］
［《集韻》公蛙切，平佳，見。］
(1)懒惰。
(2)狡诈。

諣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1170第04
【唐韻】【集韻】?呼卦切，虺去聲。【說文】疾言也。　又【廣韻】呼霸切【集韻】火跨切，?音化。義同。　又【集韻】公蛙切，音媧。【類篇】惰也，黠也。或作?。

諣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
諣字的起名意思

暂无。

Tiara
Basic explanation of words
Tiara
huà
Silly words.
Tiara
guā
Lazy; slack.
cunning.
Tiara
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huà］
["Guangyun" call the hexagram to cut, go to the hexagram, and dawn. ]
Said hurriedly.
[②]［guā］
["Ji Yun" male frog cut, Ping Jia, see you. ]
(1) Laziness.
(2) Cunning.
Tiara
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諣; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 1170 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Call the hexagram to cut, and go to the sound. [Speaking text] Talking quickly.　[Guangyun] Hubaqie [Jiyun] Fire cross-cut, sounding. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The male frog cuts, and the sound is Wah. 【Category】Idle, too. Or for?.
